idea: POWERLIFT FITNESS EQUIPMENT'S provides a wide range of products to meet the needs of every customer. From initial design to final quality assurance processes, we make sure our goods are reliable and exceptional. We’re proud to be one of the best-known names in the industry. POWERLIFT is a trusted name in the field of fitness industry in INDIA. and we are strongly promoting MAKE IN INDIA. We are the leading fitness equipment manufacturer and supplier of complete range of strength & cardio equipment's. We have manufacturing unit with latest machinery. POWERLIFT strength training products are manufactured using the latest CNC machining Technologies. All be products are fabricated from certificate & well trained engineers.Get in touch to see how you can benefit from our products.
name: ATSC FITNESS EQUIPMENTS

idea:
Our organisation is professionally managed manufacturer and Supplier of Sheet Metal Components, Welded Assemblies of automotive and non automotive products. We are known for our commitment towards understanding and fulfilling customers requirements to their fullest satisfaction. Our State-of-the Arts Stamping Division is equipped with Modern Press Shop lined up with geared, non geared, Mechanical presses of various capacities with Welding assemblies & all types of Zinc plating capabilities Spread over 2000 Sq. feet area. Also, our organisations's transporatation wing with head quarter at Thane. Established in 2017 after signing a contract with One of the market leaders in Energy sector in India. Our core team consists of trained professionals in the field of logistics, marketing, finance and operations, who are capable of handling challenging assignments in the most competitive environment.
The Company considers human resource as the most valuable and vital asset and the personnel are trained continuously to upgrade their skills and knowledge-base to meet the challenges and demands of customers in a highly competitive milieu.
We understands customer’s specific requirements and suggests innovative and tailor made solutions as the core team has the complete know-how and expertise to move goods of unconventional nature, goods that are required special care and attention.

idea:
SecOps identifies the top 1% security risks that could have the maximum impact on the organisation, thereby saving millions of dollars and hundreds of hours of engineering effort in patchwork and remediation.

It is an AI-powered agentless platform for Vulnerability Management and remediating misconfigurations in applications, infrastructure and the cloud.

SecOps configures and starts protecting your assets - within seconds not days.
name: SHIVNEEL TECHNOLOGIES LLP
